required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Latin America Real World Study With Inspiron Drug Eluting Stent - INSPIRON LATITUDE
clinical_study.official_title: LATIn American sTUdy to Investigate the Clinical Performance of Sirolimus-eluting Stent With Abluminal-only bioDEgradable Polymeric Coating (Inspiron TM) in the Treatment of Native Coronary Artery Lesions.

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective, multicenter, single arm registry to monitor post-market clinical outcomes of patients treated with Inspiron Sirolimus-Eluting Stent with Biodegradable Polymer.

detailed_description.textblock: Prospective, multicenter, single arm registry to assess the safety and performance of Inspiron Sirolimus-Eluting Stent with Biodegradable Polymer for the treatment of "real world" patients.

primary_outcome.description: Major cardiac events (death, myocardial infarction, target vessel revascularization)

secondary_outcome.description: Acute success measured by Angiography after stent implantation
Major cardiac events (death, myocardial infarction, target vessel revascularization)

study_pop.textblock: Patients with lesions in native coronary arteries measuring between 2.5 and 4.0 mm in diameter and 34 mm length treated only with Inspiron Sirolimus-Eluting Stent.
